---
title: Process Activation fcs files into flowSet.
author: Dillon Hammill
date: January 18, 2019
output_format: html_document
---
```{r}
library(DataPackageR)
library(CytoExploreR)
library(gtools)
files <- mixedsort(list.files(path = DataPackageR::project_extdata_path('Activation'),
                              full.names = TRUE))
Activation <- read.flowSet(files = files)

# Markers
chnls <- c("Alexa Fluor 405-A", 
           "Alexa Fluor 430-A", 
           "APC-Cy7-A", "PE-A", 
           "Alexa Fluor 488-A", 
           "Alexa Fluor 700-A", 
           "Alexa Fluor 647-A", 
           "7-AAD-A")
markers <- c("Hoechst-405", 
             "Hoechst-430", 
             "CD11c", 
             "Va2", 
             "CD8", 
             "CD4", 
             "CD44", 
             "CD69")
names(markers) <- chnls
markernames(Activation) <- markers

# Experimental Details
pData(Activation)$OVAConc <- c(rep(c(0,0,0.005,0.005,0.05,0.05,0.5,0.5),4),0)
pData(Activation)$Treatment <- c(rep("Stim-A", 8),rep("Stim-B",8),rep("Stim-C",8),rep("Stim-D",8),"NA")
pData(Activation)$Treatment <- factor(pData(Activation)$Treatment, levels = c("Stim-A","Stim-B","Stim-C","Stim-D","NA"))
```
